author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Title says it all - Backport of #35932

#### PR validation:
Validated with DQM playback system and also during data-taking, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35918#issuecomment-956087758 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35918#issuecomment-956119341 for the outcome of the data-taking.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport of #35932
title: [12_1_X] Improve DQM beamspot clients
